about_the_game:
Little Witch Nobeta - Bunny & Bear Muppet Skin Bundle
Little Witch Nobeta skin bundle include the Bunny suit with adorable rabbit ear and tail & your family friendly bear muppet suit. Put Nobeta in these unique outfits for a special adventure!

※
The bundle content can be unlocked in game through reaching certain achievement.
Bunny: Use ritual of magic absorption to absorb 30,000 magic points. (Divine Reaction)
Bear Muppet: Defeat Monica. (Crafted Soul, Animal Lover)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 6400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
